SELECT V.VHC_NO , DL0.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER , DL1.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND , DL2.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC , DL3.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND , DL4.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_TYPE , D.DVC_ID , D.MNG_ID , DH.MODEL_NM , IF(ULOG.COMPLETE_YN IS NULL, '예약가능', IF(ULOG.COMPLETE_YN = 'Y', '예약가능', '예약중')) AS COMPLETE_YN FROM BM_VHC_INFO V LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON V.VHC_ID = D.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_HIST DH ON D.DVC_ID = DH.DVC_ID LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL0 ON D.MAKER = DL0.DL_CD AND DL0.CO_CD = 'DVC_MAKER' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON D.DVC_KIND = DL1.DL_CD AND DL1.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON D.INST_LOC = DL2.DL_CD AND DL2.CO_CD = 'INST_LOC' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL3 ON V.VHC_KIND = DL3.DL_CD AND DL3.CO_CD = 'VHC_KIND' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL4 ON V.VHC_TYPE = DL4.DL_CD AND DL4.CO_CD = 'VHC_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_UPD_LOG ULOG ON D.MNG_ID = ULOG.MNG_ID
V.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') AND
D.USE_YN != "N" AND D.MNG_ID != "NULL"
GROUP BY D.MNG_ID ORDER BY VHC_NO
SELECT RSV_ID , MNG_ID , COMPLETE_YN FROM BM_UPD_LOG WHERE COMPLETE_YN = "N"
SELECT RSV_ID , MNG_ID , RSV_DATE FROM BM_UPD_RSV WHERE MNG_ID = #{mngId} AND RSV_DATE = #{rsvDate}
